doc.title: The Cleansing
doc.plot: The Cleansing is a short documentary film about a woman who discovers a new level of psychic awareness after a near-death experience. Director Gary Lester explores the world of the paranormal, as a research team led by author Charlie Carlson (Weird Florida) and well-known medium Susan Thompson investigates unusual occurrences in the woman's home. The film concludes with an actual psychic "cleansing."
